Plot:

A young woman named Sophie is cursed by the Witch of the Waste, turns into an old woman, and is unable to tell anyone of
her plight. Unable to continue her job at her mother&#039;s hat shop, she goes to the ambulatory castle of the notorious wizard
Howl and insinuates herself into his household. Sophie befriends Calcifer, the fire demon who powers the castle and who
is bound to Howl by a contract, the terms of which Calcifer cannot reveal. They promise to help each other with their
problems. Like Calcifer, Howl can also see through the Witch&#039;s spell, and he and Sophie fall in love. Sophie helps Howl
confront his former teacher, and the Witch of the Waste.
